name: Speedy White
description:
Dodge the obstacles and follow the white road.

Controls:

  • Left arrow -> Stay left lane
  • Right arrow -> Stay right lane
  • No arrow -> Stay middle lane

Developers:

  • Aitor Font Puig (Aitor Font) - @AitorFontPuig
  • Carlos Sevila Segarra (Casevse) - @CarlosSevila

Music:

  • Extreme Action - Bensound.com

Developed for the QaziJam 7 (23-26 september 2016). The theme was "Black and White".
